BBEX3.A.AMD.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Armenia / USD 1 = AMD ... (middle)
General: With effect from 22 November 1993, the Armenian dram was introduced as legal tender at the rate of 200 rouble = 1 dram. Since 1 March 1994, the dram has been the sole legal tender.
Source: Central Bank of Armenia, Yerevan.
Methodology: Up until 2000, calculated on the basis of month-end rates, and from 2001 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.
Comment on 2009: Exchange rate floated as from 3 March 2009.
